name: Vaziard-raze-discontinued
tagline: Discontinued Version of my Vaizard Raze Project, i dont need it anymore so i will just post it here for those interested. It had some pretty major design faults that i am fixing in the next version.
body:
Old discontinued version, Had a bad system set in place and the 39dll commit was pretty trash, ive remade my engine to work... better, but it was rewritten from scratch.

To run you need Game Maker: Studio, preferable above 1.4 for maximum support, however there is a runnable .exe in the runtime directory.

Be vary that the online does not work correctly, i managed to mess up the netcode by accident lately, you could probably get it to work if you really tried... its probably a minor bug.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
